title: Portrait of Folwell W. Coan
marks: \"TO OLIVIA COAN\", in brown, LRC \"PAXTON/1922\", in brown, LRC
description: portrait of man in profile from PL side; LRC unfinished; man has short dark hair and wears purple necktie, white shirt and brown jacket; yellow ground; glazed
creditline: Given in memory of Olivia Carpenter Coan by her family
